snippet: President Obama said he had not yet received a final recommendation on whether Cuba should be removed from the list of nations that sponsor terrorism.
abstract: Pres Obama signals that Cuba will soon be removed from list of nations that sponsor terrorism.
lead_paragraph: President Obama said he had not yet received a final recommendation on whether Cuba should be removed from the list of nations that sponsor terrorism.

headline.main: U.S. Is Closer to Deciding Cuba’s Status on Terror List
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Closer to Deciding Cuba’s Status on Terror List
